Package Controller

Class BookingsDatabaseController

Object
BookingsDatabaseController
All Implemented Interfaces:
DatabaseController
public class BookingsDatabaseController extends Object implements DatabaseController
BookingsDatabaseController is a controller that is used to write and read from the booking text file.
Since:
2022-11-02
Version:
1.0
Author:
Soh Zu Wei

      Parameters:
      movieTitle - name of movie
      cineplexName - name of cineplex
      cinemaName - name of cinema
      date - date of showing
